title: "On Day One Of My New Term...": Donald Trump's Plan For Presidency
content: Mass expulsions? Political revenge? World peace? A new golden age? As Donald Trump vies for another term in the White House, America is abuzz with speculation over how life might look with the ex-president back at the helm.
summary: Mass expulsions? Political revenge? World peace? A new golden age? As Donald Trump vies for another term in the White House, America is abuzz with speculation over how life might look with the ex-president back at the helm.

title: Donald Trump: US' Ex-President On A Quest For Revenge
content: Four months before US President Joe Biden and his predecessor Donald Trump face off at the polls, they will wage political battle Thursday in the first televised debate of the 2024 election.
summary: Four months before US President Joe Biden and his predecessor Donald Trump face off at the polls, they will wage political battle Thursday in the first televised debate of the 2024 election.

title: Joe Biden, Donald Trump Offer Contrasting Global Visions Of US
content: Ahead of their first presidential debate, Joe Biden and Donald Trump are offering sharply different visions of the US role in the world, both in style and substance.
summary: Ahead of their first presidential debate, Joe Biden and Donald Trump are offering sharply different visions of the US role in the world, both in style and substance.

title: Joe Biden - US President Who Is Seeking A Second Term At 81
content: On June 27 Americans will tune in to the first debate of the 2024 US election -- a highly anticipated showdown between President Joe Biden and his predecessor Donald Trump.
summary: On June 27 Americans will tune in to the first debate of the 2024 US election -- a highly anticipated showdown between President Joe Biden and his predecessor Donald Trump.

title: Mic Cuts, No Audience, No Fact-Checking: How Biden-Trump Debate Will Work
content: There will be no studio audience, depriving candidates of the momentum that comes from ginning up supporters. Microphones will cut out when a candidate's speaking time is over. Thursday night's presidential debate will not be business as usual.
summary: There will be no studio audience, depriving candidates of the momentum that comes from ginning up supporters. Microphones will cut out when a candidate's speaking time is over. Thursday night's presidential debate will not be business as usual.

title: Exercise Caution: Centre To Indians In Lebanon Over Tensions With Israel
content: Amid escalating tensions and a volatile security landscape in Lebanon, both India and the United States have issued stern travel advisories, urging their citizens to exercise caution and reconsider travel plans to the Middle Eastern nation.
summary: Amid escalating tensions and a volatile security landscape in Lebanon, both India and the United States have issued stern travel advisories, urging their citizens to exercise caution and reconsider travel plans to the Middle Eastern nation.

title: 2 Maldivian Ministers Arrested For 'Black Magic' On President: Report
content: Maldives police have arrested two serving ministers for allegedly performing black magic on President Mohamed Muizzu, local media reported on Thursday.
summary: Maldives police have arrested two serving ministers for allegedly performing black magic on President Mohamed Muizzu, local media reported on Thursday.

title: US Voters Prefer Biden's Democracy Approach, Trump's Economy Plan: Report
content: US voters see Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump as the better candidate for the economy but prefer his Democratic rival President Joe Biden's approach on preserving democracy, a new Reuters/Ipsos poll found.
summary: US voters see Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump as the better candidate for the economy but prefer his Democratic rival President Joe Biden's approach on preserving democracy, a new Reuters/Ipsos poll found.

title: US Agency Sanctions Boeing For Sharing Probe Details Of 737 MAX Incident
content: A US investigative authority sharply rebuked Boeing for sharing details about an ongoing probe of a near-catastrophic aviation incident that were not supposed to be discussed publicly.
summary: A US investigative authority sharply rebuked Boeing for sharing details about an ongoing probe of a near-catastrophic aviation incident that were not supposed to be discussed publicly.

title: Joe Biden vs Donald Trump Presidential Debate: When And Where To Watch?
content: US President Joe Biden and former president Donald Trump will meet on a debate stage on Thursday for the first of two televised face-offs that could prove critical in their tight rematch race to win the White House in November.
summary: US President Joe Biden and former president Donald Trump will meet on a debate stage on Thursday for the first of two televised face-offs that could prove critical in their tight rematch race to win the White House in November.

title: "Highly Misleading": Israel Slams UN-Backed Gaza Hunger Report
content: Israel on Thursday dismissed a UN-backed report that said nearly half a million Gazans faced "catastrophic" hunger, alleging the assessment was "misleading" and "biased".
summary: Israel on Thursday dismissed a UN-backed report that said nearly half a million Gazans faced "catastrophic" hunger, alleging the assessment was "misleading" and "biased".

title: Israeli Troops Rush Into Gaza Neighbourhood, Order Palestinians To Go South
content: Israel rushed into a neighbourhood in Gaza City on Thursday, ordering Palestinians to move south as the tanks rolled in and bombing the southern city of Rafah in what it says are the final stages of an operation against Hamas militants there.
summary: Israel rushed into a neighbourhood in Gaza City on Thursday, ordering Palestinians to move south as the tanks rolled in and bombing the southern city of Rafah in what it says are the final stages of an operation against Hamas militants there.

title: Space Station Astronauts Forced To Shelter After Russian Satellite Breaks Up
content: A Russian satellite has broken up into more than 100 pieces of debris in orbit, forcing astronauts on the International Space Station to take shelter, US space agencies said.
summary: A Russian satellite has broken up into more than 100 pieces of debris in orbit, forcing astronauts on the International Space Station to take shelter, US space agencies said.

title: Time Magazine Signs Multi-Year Content Deal With ChatGPT Maker OpenAI
content: Time magazine has signed a multi-year content deal with OpenAI that would give the ChatGPT maker access to its archive of news content, the companies said on Thursday.
summary: Time magazine has signed a multi-year content deal with OpenAI that would give the ChatGPT maker access to its archive of news content, the companies said on Thursday.

title: Chinese AI Startups Rush To Offset OpenAI's Plans To Curb API Access
content: ChatGPT is not available in China, but many Chinese startups have been able to access OpenAI's API platform and use it to build their own applications. Now, OpenAI plans to curb that too.
summary: ChatGPT is not available in China, but many Chinese startups have been able to access OpenAI's API platform and use it to build their own applications. Now, OpenAI plans to curb that too.

title: The Best Way To Cool Down Quickly And Safely In A Heatwave
content: As the heatwave begins to grip the UK and the heat health alert is in effect, people are looking for ways to keep cool and reduce the risk of heat stroke  the most severe form of hyperthermia, with a body temperature above 40C.
summary: As the heatwave begins to grip the UK and the heat health alert is in effect, people are looking for ways to keep cool and reduce the risk of heat stroke  the most severe form of hyperthermia, with a body temperature above 40C.

title: ChatGPT Answers Went 'Undetected', Got Better Grades Than Students: Study
content: Exam graders could have trouble spotting answers generated by AI-based chatbots, researchers said after their study found that these answers not only went undetected but were also graded better than those written by students.
summary: Exam graders could have trouble spotting answers generated by AI-based chatbots, researchers said after their study found that these answers not only went undetected but were also graded better than those written by students.

title: Rishi Sunak To Priti Patel: A look At Indian-Origin MPs In UK Parliament
content: With just over a week to go for the all-important July 4 UK polls, all eyes are now on Rishi Sunak and his Conservative Party as they attempt to retain power against a resurgent Labour Party.
summary: With just over a week to go for the all-important July 4 UK polls, all eyes are now on Rishi Sunak and his Conservative Party as they attempt to retain power against a resurgent Labour Party.

title: China's Communist Party Expels 2 Former Ministers Over Corruption: Report
content: China's Communist Party on Thursday expelled former defence minister Li Shangfu and his predecessor Wei Fenghe for "serious violations of discipline", a euphemism for corruption, state news agency Xinhua reported.
summary: China's Communist Party on Thursday expelled former defence minister Li Shangfu and his predecessor Wei Fenghe for "serious violations of discipline", a euphemism for corruption, state news agency Xinhua reported.

title: Over 50% Indians More Confident About Using AI At Work: Boston Report
content: The report, titled "AI at Work: Friend and Foe," by Boston Consulting Group (BCG), indicates that 54 per cent of Indian respondents ranked confidence in their top two sentiments towards AI at work.
summary: The report, titled "AI at Work: Friend and Foe," by Boston Consulting Group (BCG), indicates that 54 per cent of Indian respondents ranked confidence in their top two sentiments towards AI at work.
